Robert De Niro Just Took Snapchat Selfies — And the Photos Will Make Your Day!

Welcome to Snapchat, Robert De Niro!

The A-list actor was spotted playing around with the famed social media platform during the 2017 Tribeca Film Festival this week — and the photos just as awesome as you’d imagine!

The 73-year-old actor posed away with filmmaker Alex Berry on the app — and smiled away to the flower crown filter, dog sticking its tongue out filter, and more! He even wrote the word “flawless” across one of the photos of himself!

MUST SEE: Check out the Cast of ‘Meet the Parents’ Then and Now!

Though it’s unclear whether or not the Goodfellas star will make an account on his phone, we’d really love to get an inside look at the iconic star’s life offscreen!

This isn’t the first time Robert has dabbled with social media. Earlier this year, he hilariously read mean tweets on an episode of Jimmy Kimmel Live. Turns out, he wasn’t really happy with the criticism from the rolls on the platform, as he fired back at every single one with an insulting response.

MUST SEE: ‘Taxi Driver’ Cast Reunites for The Film’s 40th Anniversary!

Now it makes sense why Robert keeps so private and doesn’t have any personal social media accounts! We’re still hoping that changes one day, though.

Click through the gallery below to see the cast of Robert’s hit film Meet the Fockers then and now!
